Reviews.Title: “Very nice apartment in a great location - highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Annabella8899
Reviews.Content: flat nicely decorated appliances clean complete dvd player internet convenient family travelling 2 bedrooms master bedroom ensuite bathroom single beds quasi bunkbeds stayed apt 4th floor nice view staff helpful spoke english phone meeting thank consideration elevator hardly suitable otherwise beautiful stay gladly return fantastic location walking distance major attractions
